title: Flex Queue is Broken?

embed.description: From Diamond to Bronze 10. Flex Queue droppin elbows on all the summoners out there, hitting them up with terrible matchmaking and bad placements. I got dropped from D5 to Gold V, drop a comment below to tell me about your experiences. ggwp

body: Enjoy the clickbait title, enjoy the vid, enjoy the banter.

replies.body: I was Silver II and got placed in Bronze IV. It's not that bad and I will get out if Rito would kindly stop placing low Gold and high Silver players against me while pairing me with other Bronze players.
